original_title: Brothers in Arms: The Pals Army of World War One
overview: This film tells the epic story of the young men who joined up together, fought together and died together in World War One.  It draws on a unique collection of filmed interviews with veterans in their nineties and hundreds who vividly remember how they volunteered with their friends in the first days of war to serve in Kitchenerâ€™s Army and the Pals Battalions. They relive the heroism and heartbreak of the pals in the trenches who went over the top together.
title: Brothers in Arms: The Pals Army of World War One
